page.title: 11A TYPICAL FARM IN ARTIGARVAN
page.content: Farmers mainly grow{potatoes}and {barley}in our area, for the land is very fertile and low-lying.{Dairying is the main type of animal farming.My father owns 11O acres and leases approx-1OO acres from a neighbouring farmer.We have 92 milking cows and 71 calves.There are also 35 heifers, which are in calf.We keep some hens for our own use.In all, we have 22O animals. Our main crop is potatoes.We grow some for ourselves and the surplus is sold. We cut barley with our own combine harvestor.Years ago, we had to get a neighbour to cut the barley for us.The barley is stored for winter,to feed the cows.Other winter fodder includes 5O acres of silage.To do the work, we have 6 tractors,which are extensively used.We are the only Dairy farmers, within a 1 mile radius of our farm.
